mapper.sql: rs_id, rs_red_id, rs_amt, rs_theme, rs_valid_amount, rs_type, rs_userid, rs_bizid, rs_use_scope, rs_lifetime, rs_invest_amount, rs_starttime, rs_closetime, rs_sendtime, rs_sender, rs_state

s.rs_id AS rsId, s.rs_red_id AS rsRedId, s.rs_amt AS rsAmt, s.rs_valid_amount AS rsValidAmount, s.rs_type AS rsType, s.rs_userid AS rsUserid, s.rs_bizid AS rsBizid, s.rs_lifetime AS rsLifetime, s.rs_invest_amount AS rsInvestAmount, s.rs_starttime AS rsStarttime, s.rs_sender AS rsSender, s.rs_state AS rsState, s.rs_theme AS rsTheme, s.rs_use_scope AS rsUseScope, s.rs_closetime AS rsClosetime, s.rs_sendtime AS rsSendtime,
u.user_name AS userName, u.user_type AS userType, u.user_state AS userState, u.user_realname_isproven AS userRealnameIsproven, u.user_mobile_isbinded AS userMobileIsbinded, u.user_email_isbinded AS userEmailIsbinded, u.user_bankcard_isbinded AS userBankcardIsbinded,
r.red_name AS redName, r.red_type AS redType, r.red_state AS redState, r.red_amount AS redAmount, r.red_reward_number AS redRewardNumber, r.red_amt AS redAmt, r.red_bizid AS redBizid,
re.ru_usetime AS ruUsetime, re.ru_desc AS ruDesc, re.ru_amount AS ruAmount, re.ru_remainder_amount AS ruRemainderAmount, re.ru_deduct_fee AS ruDeductFee, re.ru_deduct_discount AS ruDeductDiscount, re.ru_usecount AS ruUsecount
mapper.insert: insert into abc_red_send (rs_red_id, rs_amt, rs_theme, rs_valid_amount, rs_type, rs_userid, rs_bizid, rs_use_scope, rs_lifetime, rs_invest_amount, rs_starttime, rs_closetime, rs_sendtime, rs_sender, rs_state ) values (#{rsRedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rsTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsValidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{rsUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsBizid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsUseScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsLifetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rsStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rsClosetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(), #{rsSender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsState,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

insert into abc_red_send (rs_red_id, rs_amt, rs_theme, rs_valid_amount, rs_type, rs_userid, rs_bizid, rs_use_scope, rs_lifetime, rs_invest_amount, rs_starttime, rs_closetime, rs_sendtime, rs_sender, rs_state ) values
(#{item.rsRedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.rsTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rsValidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.rsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.rsUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rsBizid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rsUseScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rsLifetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rsInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.rsStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.rsClosetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(), #{item.rsSender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rsState,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update:
update abc_red_send set rs_red_id = #{rsRedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rs_amt = #{rsAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rs_theme = #{rsTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rs_valid_amount = #{rsValidAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rs_type = #{rsType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rs_userid = #{rsUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rs_bizid = #{rsBizid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rs_use_scope = #{rsUseScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rs_lifetime = #{rsLifetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rs_invest_amount = #{rsInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rs_starttime = #{rsStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rs_closetime = #{rsClosetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rs_sendtime = #{rsSendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rs_sender = #{rsSender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rs_state = #{rsState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where rs_id = #{rsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from abc_red_send s left join abc_user u on s.rs_userid = u.user_id left join abc_red_use re on s.rs_id = re.ru_redvsend_id
SELECT count(*) FROM abc_red_send WHERE rs_userid=#{userId} AND rs_state=1 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(rs_closetime)
mapper.update: update abc_red_send t set t.rs_state = "0" WHERE date(t.rs_closetime) < date(#{date});
